name: Cyberverse: Experimental Cringe
description:
This is a short game (30-60 minutes) intended to be finished in one sitting.

Description

After the military develops an experimental AI known as the Zany Artificial Creative device (codenamed Z.A.C), it goes rogue. This AI's aim is to cause discourse between both humans and AI, utilising one thing: the cringe factor of MEMES.

John gets stuck with a little EMP launcher, embedded with an AI, which together is known as the Code Ordinance Device (codenamed C.O.Dy). United, John must traverse the military lab, and stop Z.A.C before his operation spreads to all capable smart electronics.

Controls

ActionKeyboard & MouseGamepadWalkWASDLeft StickAimMouseRight StickShootLeft Mouse ButtonRight TriggerSwitch EMPsMouse Wheel/Number KeysLeft/Right BumperReset to CheckpointRSelect ButtonProgress DialogueSpace/EnterSouth ButtonPauseEscapeStart/East Button
